titles.title: For the relief of Mounir Adel Hajjar.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 10/16/2002--Introduced. Declares a named individual (Mounir Adel Hajjar) to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.Denies any preferential immigration treatment for specified relatives of the individual.
